thread.title: This Is Why Natalie Portman Is No Longer Attending the Oscars Tonight
thread.title_full: This Is Why Natalie Portman Is No Longer Attending the Oscars Tonight

title: This Is Why Natalie Portman Is No Longer Attending the Oscars Tonight
text:
This Is Why Natalie Portman Is No Longer Attending the Oscars Tonight 
She has a very valid reason. By Sarah Lindig Feb 26, 2017 If you were looking forward to seeing Natalie Portman and her baby bump dressed in some stunning, flowing couture gown on tonight's red carpet, we're sorry to disappoint. The actress, who is nominated for her leading role in Jackie, will not be attending the Academy Awards ceremony this year—but for good reason. "Due to my pregnancy, I am unable to attend the Independent Spirit Awards and the Academy Awards," Portman said in a statement to People . "I feel so lucky to be honored among my fellow nominees and wish them the most beautiful of weekends." Advertisement - Continue Reading Below With husband Benjamin Millipied at the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards. Getty Portman is expecting her second child with husband Benjamin Millepied, and if her blossoming bump at the Screen Actors Guild Awards was any indication, she's probably due fairly soon. The actress has yet to publicly divulge her due date, but back in November—at which point her baby bump was already fully showing—she told Jimmy Fallon that she's not as pregnant as she looks.
